content: . In consideration of all these factors, we decided to investigate whether there is significant benefit or harm in the addition of amiodarone to beta-blockers compared to beta-blockers alone, while also reviewing our current understanding of amiodarone and beta-blockers individually with regard to POAF prevention.
query: amiodarone versus beta-blockers atrial fibrillation randomized controlled trial efficacy comparison
title: Combination prophylactic amiodarone with beta-blockers versus beta-blockers in atrial fibrillation after cardiac surgery: A systematic-review and meta-analysis
authors: Edgar Theodore Polintan, Reejeen Monsalve, Rajiv Hans Menghrajani, Kym Yves Sirilan, Sandeep Samethadka Nayak, Peter Abdelmaseeh, Gabriel Patarroyo-Aponte, Kevin Bryan Lo, Sourbha S. Dani
reference: Polintan, E. T., Monsalve, R., Menghrajani, R. H., Sirilan, K. Y., Nayak, S. S., Abdelmaseeh, P., Patarroyo-Aponte, G., Lo, K. B., & Dani, S. S. (2023). Combination prophylactic amiodarone with beta-blockers versus beta-blockers in atrial fibrillation after cardiac surgery: A systematic-review and meta-analysis. Heart & Lung, 62, 256-263. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.hrtlng.2023.08.005
